descripcion:
Ultrasol™ Blueberry is specially designed for fertigation in blueberry. Product has a high potential acidity, which helps to create an acidic pH in the rooting zone. Ultrasol™ Blueberry provides all the essential plant macro and micronutrients for the complete growth cycle and should be used in combination with Calcinit™ Greenhouse Grade (calcium nitrate) for optimum berry yield and quality.

DERIVED FROM: Ammonium Sulfate, Potassium Nitrate, Sulfate of Potash, Urea, Ammonium Phosphate, Magnesium Sulfate, Iron EDTA, Manganese EDTA, Copper EDTA, Zinc EDTA, Boric Acid, Sodium Molybdate. F1367.

POTENTIAL BASICITY: 853 lbs calcium carbonate equivalent per ton.
